interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Flawless Finish Foundation, Colour Changing Foundation, All-Day Flawless Foundation Makeup, Covering Imperfections Liquid Complete Foundation, Suitable for ALL Skin Types
Review Date: 2019/08/29
Store: CIDBEST
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.49 x 1.65 x 1.3 inches; 4.13 Ounces'}
Review Text: This makeup is crazy.  It comes out of the bottle looking like a white colored moisturizer.  When applied to the face, it immediately begins to blend with the color of the skin right before your eyes.  It has somewhat of a weird smell if you put your nose up to the bottle.  I didn't notice it once I applied or throughout the day.  This makeup does not come off onto your clothes like regular foundation.  It comes off the same way it went on.  When applying it, it goes on more like moisturizer then makeup.  Its got SPF in it so it takes an extra swipe or two to get it to completely blend in but when it does its so lightweight, you don't even notice its there. It just leaves your skin feeling soft and smooth.  Oh and you don't get that later in the day shiney look with this makeup.  It really is pretty cool stuff!
Review Title: Doesn't leave marks on clothes!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Makeup Preferences:** The user prefers lightweight makeup products with moisturizing properties that blend seamlessly with their natural skin tone. They appreciate foundations that provide coverage while feeling comfortable and not overly heavy on the skin.

- **Key Features Valued:** The user values foundations with SPF protection, long-lasting wear, and non-transferable formulas that do not leave marks on clothing. They have a preference for products that avoid a shiny finish throughout the day.

- **Scent Sensitivity:** They showed some sensitivity to product smell, noting a "weird smell" when inspecting the bottle closely, although it was not an issue during application or wear.

- **General Sentiment:** Their overall sentiment leans towards experimentation and novelty in makeup, as evidenced by their interest in a color-changing foundation, indicating an openness to innovative beauty solutions. However, their average rating suggests some reservations about performance and consistency.

- **Rating Behavior:** The user tends to give moderate ratings, which may indicate a balanced approach to product evaluation, prioritizing both positive features and potential drawbacks.

This profile reflects a user who seeks effective, innovative, and practical beauty solutions that enhance their skincare routine without compromising on comfort or convenience.
